content_blocks_page.title: Let work find you.
content_blocks_page.content: Labourers. chippies. sparkies. movers. shakers. foremen. apprentices. plumbers. concreters. riggers. painters. plasterers. specialists.

bullets.bullet: Your mates can’t always find you the best work.  Build Labour can.
